```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

url <- "https://locations.wafflehouse.com" 

page <- read_html(url)
store_data <- 
  page |> 
  html_element("script#__NEXT_DATA__") |> 
  html_text() |> 
  jsonlite::fromJSON() |>
  purrr::pluck("props", "pageProps", "locations") |>
  unnest(addressLines) |>
  unnest(custom) |> 
  as_tibble()
```
